nodes.text: Bargos was a Mon Calamari weapons officer aboard the Galactic Alliance warship Ocean, during the war between the Galactic Alliance and the Confederation. He was ordered to fire a torpedo into empty space to confirm whether Jacen Solo had seen a hidden fleet arrive into the Fondor system as he previously reported. In fact, it had been a Fallanassi illusion used by Luke Skywalker against Solo helping to further place doubt in the minds of officers in Solo's competence.
